title: 100 Circles of Hell
description:
So, it was all Eve's fault, was it? 
   Adam was just sitting around, minding his own business, right? 
   "Hey, Eve.  Let's tell him it was your fault.  He'll go easier on you." 
   Poor Eve, she just didn't know what she was getting herself into. 
   She should have known better than to trust a man. 
 Meet Marcie.  More than anything else in the world, she wishes she had never trusted a man.How did things go so wrong? Marcie Warren Braxton fought hard to survive her rotten childhood.But when she was finally free, she made one bad decision after another.Until she was trapped again.100 Circles of Hell is Marcie's cry for help. 
   Beginning with her earliest childhood memories, Marcie paints a picture of her life. 
   Courageous in many ways, Marcie endures abuse to save others from harm. 
   Will she ever place her own happiness first?
author: Nory Campbell
